import pyautogui
import time

# Click on the "Restore" button to maximize the window
pyautogui.click(2334, 37)
time.sleep(1)

import time

# Click on the "Maximise" button to maximize the window
pyautogui.click(1400, 42)
time.sleep(1)

import pyautogui
import time

# Press Ctrl+Shift+O to open the bookmarks manager
pyautogui.hotkey('ctrl', 'shift', 'o')
time.sleep(1)

import pyautogui
import time

# Click on the "Name" field to focus it
pyautogui.click(1020, 794)
time.sleep(0.5)

# Type the name "Favorites"
pyautogui.write('Favorites')
time.sleep(0.5)

# Click on the "Save" button
pyautogui.click(1438, 866)
